item.title: Wedding in Turin
item.description: 18:00 Wedding ceremony The ceremony takes place at the Marble Room of the Civil Palace of Turin. Address: Piazza Palazzo de citta 5 20:00 Dinner We will have a small dinner reception at the Norman restaurant. It is ten minutes by walk from the Civil palace, we plan to walk the distance alltogether.

item.title: Reception in Warsaw
item.description: The reception will take place in the Boathouse restaurant. 18:00 Welcome We start the event by a welcoming in the garden space. There will be drinks and finger food served, time to make photos together and chat. 19:30 Dinner 21:00 Party Opening of the dancefloor.
